    Hi there. I’m Dylan Jayatilaka.

    I’m a Professor and chemist working in theory, computation and diffraction at the remote and wonderful University of Western Australia (UWA).

    I have started at UWA and ended at UWA.

    Full circle?

    But along the way I picked up a few tricks at Cambridge England, at NASA Ames in Mountain View California, the Ecole Normale Superieure in Paris, and the Autralian National University in Canberra. And now more than ever, from you out there through the liquid crystal of this beautiful and misanthropic terminal.
